charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was strolling along
the coast one day, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Grimsley and
Sharpedo gazing out at the sea.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0401_0300_1:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I had a sneaking suspicion you’d call out to me.
Looks like my coin toss was right on the money.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0302_0400_1: Maybe I should leave them alone...
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0402_0500_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I thought you’d
call out to me. Guess that coin I flipped landed
on the wrong side...
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_0600_1:
Why the surprised look on your face? Is it really
so unusual that I was aware of your presence?
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_0700_1:
No, maybe you’re surprised about
something else...
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_0800_1:
Are you wondering what I’m doing out here in the
middle of the day, when battles at night are more
my style?
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_0900_1:
I see. Well, you certainly have a valid reason to
be surprised. Can you guess why I’m here, then?
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0401_1100_1:
Heh, I suppose it would look that way. You could
call it both playing and training. I was riding the
waves with Sharpedo.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0402_1300_1:
Heh, I suppose it does look that way. You could
call it both playing and training. I was riding the
waves with Sharpedo.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_1400_1: Why do you still look so surprised?
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_1500_1:
Did you know there’s a part of the world where
people surf on Sharpedo? It’s treated like a
sport there.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_1600_1:
Sharpedo is known as the bully of the sea, and
it swims at incredibly high speeds. Sounds fun to
surf on, doesn’t it?
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_1700_1:
There’s no greater thrill than the rough and wild
swimming of a Sharpedo. Plus, surfing on one is
an excellent way to hone your reflexes.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_1800_1:
Sharpedo and I work as one, reading the ocean’s
current as we ride the waves together.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_1900_1:
Being so synchronized also helps us work toward
being the best in a variety of battle situations.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_2000_1:
When you train with your partner, you can feel
the power that only they possess.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0401_2200_1: Heh. I had a feeling you’d understand.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0402_2400_1:
Heh. You should have more confidence in
yourself. You’re stronger than you realize.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_2500_1:
Plus, sync strength has a profound effect on
battles here.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_2600_1:
You could say that all the time you spend together
is just practice for your next victory.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_2700_1: Say, how would you like to try surfing sometime?
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0401_2900_1:
Heh. Looks like we’re both cut from the same
thrill-seeking cloth.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_0402_3100_1:
Oh well. If you ever change your mind, let me
know. Maybe we can compete against each other
once your surfing skills are up to snuff.
charaepi_ch0048_10_gima/2301_1201_3200_1:
As a thrill seeker, I’m excited to see just how
much you improve.
